lead_paragraph: Thirteen people in the area, all of whom had serious underlying medical conditions, began to experience symptoms in September.

headline.main: One Dead in New Bronx Outbreak of Legionnaires’ Disease
headline.print_headline: One Dead in New Legionnaires’ Outbreak; City Orders Cleaning of Cooling Towers
